author: vkhristenko
body:
This backports the HCAL DQM update from https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/17657 to 8_3_0. The following changes were needed:

- DQM/Integration/python/clients/hcal2_dqm_sourceclient-live_cfg.py: use only eras.run2_HF_2017 era, and remove hbheplan1 producer (go back to hbhereco). The GT is forced to be 90X_dataRun2_HLT_frozen_v2. 
- DQM/HcalCommon/interface/Constants.h: the 8_3_0 emap still includes crate 36 (uMNio/laser was moved to crate 38), so I put that back in the crate-FED maps.  

@vkhristenko
title: Backport 9_0_0_pre5 changes to 8_3_0
